author: Special Correspondent
text:
A cattle herder of Hasanur village was reportedly trampled by elephants in adjoining forest area of Sathyamangalam Tiger Reserve on Thursday.

The body of the victim identified as Chickka Sivanappa was found by a team of anti-poaching watchers. The villager had gone into the forest in search of cattle when he was attacked by the elephants.

The Forest Department provided an interim relief of Rs. 25,000 to the family of the victim, and arranged for the post- mortem.
title: Man trampled to death by elephants
